description:
SEVEN REASONS WHY THIS COURSE IS AWESOME:

  1. More REAL LIFE EXAMPLES than any other course (400+!!).
  2. More ACTIONABLE TECHNIQUES than any other course (100+).
  3. More RESEARCHED-BASED INFORMATION than any other course.
  4. More CONTENT created by a CERTIFIED TRAINING PROFESSIONAL (with a MASTERS specializing in LEARNING and HUMAN PERFORMANCE!).
  5. The ONLY course based off a popular SOCIAL SKILLS BOOK.
  6. More useful PRACTICE EXERCISES designed to achieve REAL RESULTS.
  7. 5.5 HOURS of useful and engaging video content with actual examples.


Social skills are they key to achieving your dreams; great jobs, relationships, confidence, and happiness. Without social skill proficiency, you'll always struggle with the most important things in life. By studying the best conversationalists, you'll upgrade your own skills. 

What would you discover if you recorded and analyzed every conversation you encountered or observed for the last 15 years? You could potentially unlock the secret of what separates the best conversationalists from everyone else. I did just that. I deconstructed the behaviors and conversations of the best conversationalists I could find. The end result is my book, Everyday Conversations, and this training.

This training covers the Seven Habits of Exceptional Conversationalists. What they do differently, what they say, and what you can do – starting right now. Learn hundreds of actionable techniques for helping you survive – and thrive – in every kind of conversation and social situation. Contains hundreds of real-life examples! No fluff, just the good stuff.

Cheers,

Greg
title: UPGRADE YOUR SOCIAL SKILLS: The 7 Habits of Social Masters
